documentation.text: @dev Converts a `uint256` to its ASCII `string` representation.

opcodes: PUSH20 0x0 ADDRESS EQ PUSH1 0x80 PUSH1 0x40 MSTORE PUSH1 0x0 DUP1 REVERT INVALID LOG2 PUSH5 0x6970667358 0x22 SLT KECCAK256 0xAD DUP9 DUP9 STATICCALL 0x29 0xD8 PUSH3 0xF94176 SWAP10 0xC8 0x2C ADD CODECOPY LT RETURNDATACOPY 0xC3 0xDD 0xDC 0xE4 AND 0xDF 0x23 DUP6 0xF7 SWAP7 SELFDESTRUCT 0xDE 0xFC 0xE6 RETURNDATACOPY PUSH5 0x736F6C6343 STOP MOD 0xC STOP CALLER
